Hero.description: Ashwatthama Microfinance combines cutting-edge fintech with a deep cultural understanding of Channarayapatna’s community.

Footer.description: Global standard financial services rooted in community trust. RBI Registered NBFC Partner, empowering local growth for half a decade.
Footer.address_text: No. 12/4, Main Road, Near Old Bus Stand, Channarayapatna, Hassan, KA - 573116
Footer.rights: © 2026 Ashwatthama Microfinance. Registered Office: Hassan, Karnataka, India.

Opportunities.title: Financial Opportunities
Opportunities.card1_desc: Maximize your savings with our highest interest bracket for FD above ₹1 Lakh.
Opportunities.card2_desc: Join the 2026 Gold Loan mela in Hassan. On-the-spot appraisals and disbursal.
Opportunities.card3_desc: Consistency pays. Get 1% extra annual returns on daily collection accounts.

WhyUs.title: Built Differently for Our Community
WhyUs.subtitle: We bridge the gap between rural aspirations and professional banking standards.
WhyUs.feature1_desc: Banking at your kitchen table. Our authorized agents collect deposits and process loans at your home.
WhyUs.feature2_desc: Competitive micro-credit rates that help small businesses scale without the high cost of traditional debt.
WhyUs.feature3_desc: e-KYC and digital verification mean no more long queues or complicated paperwork at the branch.

AppShowcase.title: Your Pocket Bank in Kannada
AppShowcase.description: Track your daily Pigmy deposits, check interest statements, and apply for loans instantly on the go.

Awards.title: Recognitions & Reach
Awards.subtitle: Our commitment to excellence recognized at the national level.

Testimonials.main_quote: Their support helped me expand my boutique when no one else would listen. The cultural understanding they bring to banking is truly unique.
Testimonials.card1_text: The gold loan process took only 15 minutes. Truly the fastest service in Hassan district.
Testimonials.card2_text: Doorstep pigmy collection has helped me save ₹500 every day without fail. Highly recommended.

loan-section.description: A global standard tech-fin gateway designed for the local ecosystem. Secure, transparent, and built on trust.

about-section.title: Redefining Rural Finance with Modern Technology
about-section.description: Ashwatthama Microfinance was born with a single mission: to provide world-class financial infrastructure to the underserved. Over the last five years, we have evolved from a local cooperative into a digital-first financial power-house, bridging the gap between traditional banking and the modern fintech era.

it.title: Modern IT Service
it.desc: End-to-end encrypted digital core for seamless transactions.

people.title: Expert People
people.desc: Certified financial advisors with local community knowledge.

support.title: Global Support
support.desc: 24/7 centralized helpline for all your banking needs.

trust.title: Trust Secured
trust.desc: Rigorous compliance and global data security standards.

loan-products.title: Loan Products for Every Need
loan-products.description: Competitive rates, flexible tenure, and minimal documentation across our entire range of credit facilities.

home.title: Home Loan
home.desc: Build your dream home with our affordable housing finance options starting from 8.5% interest.

agri.title: Agricultural Loan
agri.desc: Seasonal credit for farmers to purchase seeds, equipment, and modern technology.

vehicle.title: Vehicle Loan
vehicle.desc: From tractors to family cars, get on the road faster with our quick approval process.

personal.title: Personal Loan
personal.desc: Unsecured credit for emergency needs, weddings, or personal milestones.

business.title: Business Loan
business.desc: Fuel your enterprise with MSME credit designed for growth and sustainability.

animal.title: Animal Husbandry
animal.desc: Supporting dairy and poultry farmers with specialized livestock financing.

Invest.title: Investment Opportunities that grow
Invest.description: Our fixed-income products offer industry-leading interest rates with the security of a regulated institution. Start small, think big.
Invest.fd_desc: Highest yield for senior citizens and long-term members.
Invest.pigmy_desc: Micro-savings collected at your doorstep every single day.

NotFound.title_main: Even the best paths have a
NotFound.desc: It seems the financial route you are looking for is currently unavailable. Let us help you get back on track.
NotFound.search_placeholder: Search for loans, gold rates, or branches...

contact.description: Whether you have questions about loans, savings, or technical support, our specialized team is here to ensure your financial journey is seamless.

cards.callDesc: Talk to our experts for immediate assistance.
cards.emailDesc: For detailed queries or documentation support.

locator.title: Branch Locator
locator.desc: Visit our branches for personalized financial consultation.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.desc: Fill out the form below and we will contact you within 24 hours.
form.name: Full Name

aboutHero.description: For five years, Ashwatthama has been more than a financial institution. We are a partner in rural growth, bridging the gap between local wisdom and global standards.

missionVision.missionDesc: To empower 1 million rural households by 2030 through accessible, technology-driven financial products that respect cultural values and foster sustainable growth.
missionVision.visionDesc: To be the gold standard for micro-banking in India, where every village has a digital gateway to prosperity and every farmer is a business leader.

2019.label: The Founding
2019.description: Ashwatthama Microfinance was established in Hassan with a team of 5 visionaries and a small office.

2021.label: Digital Transformation
2021.description: Launched our proprietary cloud-based banking core, enabling paperless KYC and instant loan processing.

2023.label: 1 Lakh Members Milestone
2023.description: We proudly reached the milestone of serving 100,000 active members across 50+ service branches.

2024.label: 5th Anniversary & Expansion
2024.description: Celebrating 5 years of excellence with the launch of new Agricultural and MSME specialized credit lines.

values.trustDesc: Financial integrity is our bedrock. We maintain total transparency in interest rates and documentation.
values.empowerDesc: We don't just lend money; we provide tools, training, and support to build sustainable livelihoods.
values.transparencyDesc: No hidden charges. No fine print. A clear, honest dialogue with every member we serve.

careersHero.description: Be part of a team that's redefining rural finance through innovation, integrity, and deep community impact.

culture.title: Life at Ashwatthama
culture.subtitle: We foster an environment where professional growth meets personal fulfillment.
culture.growthDesc: Continuous learning pathways, certification support, and internal promotion tracks to fuel your career.
culture.impactDesc: Directly empower rural entrepreneurs and witness the tangible change your work brings to local lives.
culture.balanceDesc: Flexible schedules and wellness initiatives ensuring you have time for what matters most outside of work.

Ctestimonials.quote: Ashwatthama gave me the platform to not just lead, but to truly transform lives. The culture of trust here is unlike any other financial institution.
Ctestimonials.author: Raghavendra M.

apply.title: Submit Your CV for Future Roles
apply.description: We are always looking for passionate talent to join our mission. Drop your details and we'll contact you when a suitable position opens up.
